allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
prune longest connections from each star after triangulation

Add post-processing step that removes the longest connection from
each star \(if it has more than one\). This creates a sparser, more
realistic looking star map by eliminating the long edges that
Delaunay triangulation tends to create at the boundaries.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor SectorService to follow IOSP principle

Apply Integration Operation Segregation Principle:
- Integration methods only orchestrate other methods
- Operation methods only contain logic, no method calls
- Extract helper records \(GridDimensions, Bounds\)
- Extract constants for magic values
- Clear separation with section comments

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
